name: Claw Clash
description:
Help Chim Chao protect his friends from the claw!

Use the balls to knock the claw out, but make sure you don't end up becoming the prize yourself!

Crane Corps Roles

  • Creative Director - Christian Ocampo
  • Producer - Lily Nghi
  • Design Lead - Samuel Edwards
  • Art Lead - Christian Ocampo
  • Technical Lead - Ian Valle
  • Sound Design - Alex Gonzalez
  • Programmers - Ciante McLemore, Ian Valle, Samuel Edwards
  • 3D Art - Christian Ocampo, Lily Nghi, Alex Gonzalez
  • 2D Art - Christian Ocampo, Lily Nghi
